snippet: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner’s machinations while in office ensure that she will continue to exert her sway over the country’s future.

byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and JONATHAN GILBERT

abstract: Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is set to complete her second and last term in office, but she has maneuvered series of calculated moves that will maintain her influence even after new president is elected; in addition to endorsing candidate Daniel Scioli, who is widely expected to continue her policies, she has also pushed through law that will effectively make it hard to undo her past decisions.
lead_paragraph: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner’s machinations while in office ensure that she will continue to exert her sway over the country’s future.

headline.print_headline: Election Will End a President’s Term, but Not Her Hold on Argentina
headline.main: Election Will End Kirchner’s Presidency, Not Her Hold on Argentina
